item.title: Limitations of the Dropbox Data Store API
item.description: or this tutorial I had actually wanted to develop a simple app which would allow me to collect email addresses of subscribers for my blog. I quickly concluded this was not very easy to do with the Data Store API, at least not in a transparent way. At the moment I feel the Data Store API is missing some crucial elements that developers require.
